name: emby_smart_cache
author: Tegenett
description: Smart caching for Emby media files - automatically moves actively watched content to fast storage

2026.02.09.1: BUGFIX: Cooldown now properly waits before caching
BUGFIX: Pre-cache next episodes now waits for cooldown first
NEW: Rsync retry logic with exponential backoff
NEW: Speed/time tracking for cache operations
FIX: pluginURL now set for update checking
FIX: Icon now displays in Unraid GUI
